title: Face unlock is not working
content:
When I try to set up the face data, it just continuously tells me 'fit your face in the inner frame' , no matter how close or far away I hold my face, that's all I get.. After a minute or so, it gives up and tells me to try 'fast setup' with the exact same results. 'fit your face to the inner frame' .
Fully reset of the device is not helped.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
